Uses of Class
asteroids.Angle

    • Uses of Angle in asteroids

      Methods in asteroids that return Angle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Angle Direction.getAngle()
      Returns the angle of this direction.
      Methods in asteroids with parameters of type Angle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Direction.canHaveAsAngle(Angle angle)
      Checks whether this direction can have the given angle as its angle.
      void Direction.rotate(Angle angle)
      Rotates this direction by the given angle.
      void Direction.setAngle(Angle angle)
      Sets the angle of this direction to the given angle.
      void Angle.sum(Angle a)
      Adds a given angle to this angle.
      void Ship.turn(Angle angle)
      Changes the direction of this ship based on the current angle and a given angle.
      Constructors in asteroids with parameters of type Angle 
      Constructor and Description
      Direction(Angle angle)
      Initializes this new direction with a given angle.
